name: Buffy Chadwick
bio: Heiress to the Chadwick Iron Smelting fortune, My Manhattan penthouse is often considered an unofficial wing of the Guggenheim.

offer.accept: Well, all right. I guess I can buy another poodle.
offer.enthusiasm: Oh, you've made me so happy. So very happy!

name: Popsy
bio: Hello! I'm Lord Worthinghamshire VII, but my friends call me Popsy. My ancestor Lord Worthinghamshire I was able to obtain art for free by looting it from the colonies. Now, people insist we 'pay' instead. Rubbish!

offer.insulted: Come now, old boy, there's no need to be rude
offer.enthusiasm: Surely you're taking the piss, eh? What? You're serious?

name: Yuri Smirnoff
bio: I quote-unquote 'made' a lot of money in the fall of the USSR. Need to get it out of Russia without my friend Vladimir getting suspicious.

offer.insulted: You make me another offer like that I will break your legs.
offer.enthusiasm: Very generous! I include free bottle of vodka.

name: Gavin Belson
bio: Every piece I contribute to my private museum is another tax deduction! Of course it's open to the public. Drop by any time between 3:17 and 3:23pm on any third Tuesday of the month during a full moon.

name: The Prince
bio: My grandfather rode a camel. My father drives a Mercedes. I also drive a Mercedes. Sometimes two. I stand with one foot on each and wear them like roller skates. Oh, also I buy art.

offer.insulted: May the fleas of a thousand camels infest your crotch.
offer.reject: You know we like to haggle, right?
offer.accept: Fine! I'll allow it! You can rob me this one time!
offer.enthusiasm: A thousand blessings on your house.

name: Bleve Blartin
bio: I love art more than most collectors, because I too am an artist. Have you seen my directorial debut, 'Fartin in Memphis'? A triumph!

offer.insulted: Come on now, I get more than that for cutting the ribbon a Walgreens.
offer.reject: Let me think about it and get back to you.
offer.accept: All right. I was getting bored of that piece anyway.
offer.enthusiasm: Hachi Machi, with that I can finally make my dream film: 'Fartin in Tallahassee!'

name: JD Wong
bio: The rolling 10-year average ROI on a carefully curated art portfolio can outperform stocks, bonds, and most commodities. It is an underrated investment strategy.

offer.insulted: In finance that would be what we call 'getting screwed'.
offer.reject: Ehh, the juice ain't worth the squeeze.
offer.enthusiasm: Looks like bonus season came early this year.
